scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains a draft of a chapter from Quintin Oropilla y Fortich’s Archival Documentation of Philippine Coins and Medals, 1597-1897, entitled “1880 and 1881 Alfonso XII Gold 4-P: Authentic Casa Moneda De Manila Issue ??? or a Numismatic Forgery ???.” Includes photocopies of archival documents from his research: letters and telegrams signed by various officials of the Casa de Moneda de Manila requesting coin dies and other materials (1880), mint decree (November 23, 1880), statement of account reports (1880, 1881, 1882, 1885), official printage tabulation (1881), and report of printage (1886).
